Cudahy () is a city in Milwaukee County: The Cudahy School District provides public education for the area. Cudahy High School is the local high school.St. Paul's Lutheran School is a K4-8 Christian grade school of the Wisconsin Evangelical Lutheran Synod in Cudahy.
